name: Kata-martian Defense Force
description:
Lore

**Aliens** have invaded the Kata-Martian moon. As an elite agent of the Kata-Martian defense force, you have been dispatched to terminate the aliens. Your mission is to take out the Alien leader.

Use your powers at a Kata-Martian to grow in size by rolling over your foes and the debris they drop. Be wary! You must be larger than your enemy before you can absorb them. If you take damage, you will shrink in size. Kata-Martians are unstable by nature so the debris that you have stuck to you will **EXPIRE** over time. Make sure you keep rolling over your enemies to keep up the momentum.

Use your Kata-Martian Defense Force weapons to weaken your enemies. **CRAFT** new weapons by rolling over your enemies. Once you hit a sufficient size, your enemies will **FUSE** into a new weapon.

Good luck soldier. You will need it.

NOTE: There's a minor bug at the end when you beat the game where the mouse cursor stays hidden. You can still Alt-Tab out of the game and close it through Windows.

 Controls

[ESC] = Open Menu to adjust sound and quit the game

[W] = Move Forward  
[S] = Move Backward  
[A] = Move Left  
[D] = Move Right  

[Left Click] = Fire  
[Scroll Wheel] = Change Weapons  
[1] = Change to weapon 1  
[2] = Change to weapon 2  
[3] = Change to weapon 3
